He holds an undergraduate degree and a Ph.D. from Nankai University in China. Before coming to Nankai University in 2001, he worked at international trade and Securities company. Liu has worked in the areas of logistics planning and policy and Port Economics. He has published two books, including Research on the Logistics Industry Analysis and the Development of Port Economy, as well as over twenty articles in important academic journals.Thesis monographpublicationsGrantsAwardsServiceTeaching  NKU College of Economic and Social Development94 Weijin Road, Nankai District, Tianjin, P.R.China 300071Ph: +86-022-23503746Fax:+86-022-23505067cesd-info@nankai.edu.cnJun Liu-College of Economic and Social DevelopmentJun Liu-College of Economic and Social Development  HOME About CESDMission and VisionAdministrationVisit CESD Academic ProgramsDoctoral ProgramsMaster’s ProgramsInternational Collaboration Programs Research & FacultyAcademic AreaResearch ProgressCommunity ImpactFaculty Members Alumni CommunityAlumni AssociationAlumni EventsBenefits & Services中文 Nankai University in Tianjin of China NKU College of Economic and Social Development 中文About CESDMission and VisionAdministrationVisit CESDAcademic ProgramsDoctoral ProgramsMaster’s ProgramsInternational Collaboration ProgramsResearch & FacultyAcademic AreaResearch ProgressCommunity ImpactFaculty MembersAlumni CommunityAlumni AssociationAlumni EventsBenefits & ServicesAcademic AreaResearch ProgressCommunity ImpactFaculty MembersResearch & FacultyJun LiuAssociate Professor, liuj@nankai.edu.cn Office Hours:By AppointmentCV Website:https://esd.nankai.edu.cn/info/1216/2758.htm Ph.D. in Economics, Nankai University Fields：Logistics Planning and Policy, Port EconomicsJun Liu is Associate Professor of Economics at Nankai University. University Fields：Logistics Planning and Policy, Port EconomicsJun Liu is Associate Professor of Economics at Nankai University. He holds an undergraduate degree and a Ph.D. from Nankai University in China. Before coming to Nankai University in 2001, he worked at international trade and Securities company. Liu has worked in the areas of logistics planning and policy and Port Economics. He has published two books, including Research on the Logistics Industry Analysis and the Development of Port Economy, as well as over twenty articles in important academic journals.Thesis monographpublicationsGrantsAwardsServiceTeachingResearch & FacultyJun LiuAssociate Professor, liuj@nankai.edu.cn Office Hours:By AppointmentCV Website:https://esd.nankai.edu.cn/info/1216/2758.htm Ph.D. in Economics, Nankai University Fields：Logistics Planning and Policy, Port EconomicsJun Liu is Associate Professor of Economics at Nankai University.
